thread.title: Scott Nugent - The Faison Center
thread.title_full: ACityDiscount reviewed by Scott Nugent - The Faison Center

author: Scott Nugent - The Faison Center
title: Scott Nugent - The Faison Center
text: Product was offered at a great price, arrived quickly, well packaged for shipping, in the quantity and condition advertised/ordered. I order a lot of timers for use in educational programs and this was my first time ordering from ACityDiscount. Over thirty items in this one and all of them (product and packaging) were in pristine condition. They did a great job! Thanks.
